# Contributing

## Submitting Plugins

1. Create `plugins/<plugin-name>/` directory
2. Add `.claude-plugin/plugin.json` with name and version
3. Add plugin entry to `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`
4. Add content (skills/, commands/, .lsp.json, etc.)
5. Add `README.md` for your plugin
6. Open a PR

## Plugin Structure

See [CLAUDE.md](../CLAUDE.md) for detailed structure guidelines.

## Reporting Issues

Use GitHub Issues for bugs and feature requests.
